Structs/SwiftHooksConfig/Commands/Prefix.name: string(_:)
Structs/SwiftHooksConfig/Commands/Prefix.abstract: Use a static String as prefix. For example ! or /

Structs/CommandEvent.html#/s:10SwiftHook.name: user
Structs/CommandEvent.html#/s:10SwiftHook.abstract: User that executed the command. Can be downcast to backend specific type.

Structs/CommandEvent.html#/s:10SwiftHook.name: args
Structs/CommandEvent.html#/s:10SwiftHook.abstract: String arguments passed in to the command. All space separated strings after the commands trigger.

Structs/CommandEvent.html#/s:10SwiftHook.name: name
Structs/CommandEvent.html#/s:10SwiftHook.abstract: Full trigger of the command. Either name or name and group.

Structs/CommandEvent.html#/s:10SwiftHook.name: hook
Structs/CommandEvent.html#/s:10SwiftHook.abstract: Hook that originally dispatched this command. Can be downcast to backend specific type.

Structs/CommandEvent.html#/s:10SwiftHook.name: logger
Structs/CommandEvent.html#/s:10SwiftHook.abstract: Command specific logger. Has command trigger set as command metadata by default.

Structs/Group.html#/s:10SwiftHooks5Group.name: group(_:)
Structs/Group.html#/s:10SwiftHooks5Group.abstract: Add a group prefix to these commands.

Structs/IDChecker.html.name: IDChecker
Structs/IDChecker.html.abstract: Checks if a user is allowed to execute based on their ID

Structs/ArrayArgCommand.html.name: ArrayArgCommand
Structs/ArrayArgCommand.html.abstract: Base command with four or more arguments

Structs/Group.html.name: Group
Structs/Group.html.abstract: Group multiple Commands together, optionally providing a group prefix.

Structs/CommandEvent.html.name: CommandEvent
Structs/CommandEvent.html.abstract: Event passed in to a command closure containing required data.

Structs/Listener.html.name: Listener
Structs/Listener.html.abstract: Listener used to listen to specific hook events.

Structs/GlobalListener.html.name: GlobalListener
Structs/GlobalListener.html.abstract: Listener used to listen to global events.

Protocols/Userable.html#/s:10SwiftHooks8.name: identifier
Protocols/Userable.html#/s:10SwiftHooks8.abstract: Identifier of the user. Should be platform unique.

Protocols/Userable.html#/s:10SwiftHooks8.name: mention
Protocols/Userable.html#/s:10SwiftHooks8.abstract: String that will mention the user when sent. For example @username or <@userid>

Protocols/Messageable.html#/s:10SwiftHoo.name: gChannel
Protocols/Messageable.html#/s:10SwiftHoo.abstract: Channel this message was sent in. Can be downcast to backend specific type.

Protocols/Messageable.html#/s:10SwiftHoo.name: gAuthor
Protocols/Messageable.html#/s:10SwiftHoo.abstract: Author of the message. Can be downcast to the backend specific type.

Protocols/Messageable.html#/s:10SwiftHoo.name: reply(_:)
Protocols/Messageable.html#/s:10SwiftHoo.abstract: Send a message back to the received message.

Protocols/Messageable.html#/s:10SwiftHoo.name: error(_:on:)
Protocols/Messageable.html#/s:10SwiftHoo.abstract: Sends an error that occured on a command.

Protocols/Plugin.html#/s:10SwiftHooks6Pl.name: commands
Protocols/Plugin.html#/s:10SwiftHooks6Pl.abstract: Commands in this Plugin. Use Group to group commands together.

Protocols/Plugin.html#/s:10SwiftHooks6Pl.name: listeners
Protocols/Plugin.html#/s:10SwiftHooks6Pl.abstract: Listeners in this Plugin. Use Listeners to group listeners together.

Protocols/EventListeners.html#/s:10Swift.name: register(to:)
Protocols/EventListeners.html#/s:10Swift.abstract: Used to register listener closures to main SwiftHooks class.

Protocols/EventListeners.html#/s:10Swift.name: register(to:)
Protocols/EventListeners.html#/s:10Swift.abstract: Used to register listener closures to a specific _Hook.

Protocols/_Hook.html#/s:10SwiftHooks5_Ho.name: user
Protocols/_Hook.html#/s:10SwiftHooks5_Ho.abstract: The bot user this Hook controls. Can be nil if no bot user exists.

Protocols/_Hook.html#/s:10SwiftHooks5_Ho.name: eventLoopGroup
Protocols/_Hook.html#/s:10SwiftHooks5_Ho.abstract: EventLoopGroup this hook is running on. If not used standalone, this will be shared with the main SwiftHooks class.

Protocols/_Hook.html#/s:10SwiftHooks5_Ho.name: register(_:)
Protocols/_Hook.html#/s:10SwiftHooks5_Ho.abstract: Register a plugin to a single hook.

Protocols/Hook.html#/s:10SwiftHooks4Hook.name: init(_:_:)
Protocols/Hook.html#/s:10SwiftHooks4Hook.abstract: Create a new instance of Hook using it’s Options.

Protocols/ExecutableCommand.html#/s:10Sw.name: closure
Protocols/ExecutableCommand.html#/s:10Sw.abstract: Closure to execute when command is invoked.

Protocols/ExecutableCommand.html#/s:10Sw.name: readableArguments
Protocols/ExecutableCommand.html#/s:10Sw.abstract: Human readable string of arguments required for this command.

Protocols/ExecutableCommand.html#/s:10Sw.name: help
Protocols/ExecutableCommand.html#/s:10Sw.abstract: Human readable help string explaining command usage.

Protocols/_ExecutableCommand.html#/s:10S.name: help
Protocols/_ExecutableCommand.html#/s:10S.abstract: Help description of the command. Used to explain usage to users.

Protocols/_ExecutableCommand.html#/s:10S.name: group
Protocols/_ExecutableCommand.html#/s:10S.abstract: Optional group of the command. If set primary triggre will become group name

Protocols/_ExecutableCommand.html#/s:10S.name: alias
Protocols/_ExecutableCommand.html#/s:10S.abstract: List of aliases. Secondary triggers for command.

Protocols/_ExecutableCommand.html#/s:10S.name: hookWhitelist
Protocols/_ExecutableCommand.html#/s:10S.abstract: Hook whitelist. Commands will only get executed if message is sent from hooks in this list.

Protocols/_ExecutableCommand.html#/s:10S.name: permissionChecks
Protocols/_ExecutableCommand.html#/s:10S.abstract: Permission checks to run before command logic is executed.

Protocols/_ExecutableCommand.html#/s:10S.name: readableArguments
Protocols/_ExecutableCommand.html#/s:10S.abstract: Arguments for this command to be used in help.

Protocols/_ExecutableCommand.html#/s:10S.name: validate()
Protocols/_ExecutableCommand.html#/s:10S.abstract: Validates if a command is valid. See also: CommandError

Protocols/Commands.html#/s:10SwiftHooks8.name: group(_:)
Protocols/Commands.html#/s:10SwiftHooks8.abstract: Add a group prefix to these commands.

Protocols/CommandArgument.html#/s:10Swif.name: isOptional
Protocols/CommandArgument.html#/s:10Swif.abstract: Indicating wether or not the argument is optional and can be nil.

Protocols/CommandArgument.html#/s:10Swif.name: isConsuming
Protocols/CommandArgument.html#/s:10Swif.abstract: Indicating wether or not the argument is consuming, or will take a single argument.

Protocols/CommandArgumentConvertible.htm.name: ResolvedArgument
Protocols/CommandArgumentConvertible.htm.abstract: The type arguments will be resolved to.

Protocols/CommandArgumentConvertible.htm.name: resolveArgument(_:on:)
Protocols/CommandArgumentConvertible.htm.abstract: Attempts to resolve an argument from the provided string.

Protocols/CommandArgumentConvertible.htm.name: resolveArgument(_:arg:on:)
Protocols/CommandArgumentConvertible.htm.abstract: Attempts to resolve an argument from the provided string.

Protocols/CommandPermissionChecker.html#.name: check(_:canUse:on:)
Protocols/CommandPermissionChecker.html#.abstract: Check if the given user has the permission to execute the command.

Protocols/CommandPermissionChecker.html.name: CommandPermissionChecker
Protocols/CommandPermissionChecker.html.abstract: Check if the given user has the permission to execute the command.

Protocols/Hook.html.name: Hook
Protocols/Hook.html.abstract: A Hook within SwiftHooks is a backend implementation emitting events. For example Discord, Slack or GitHub

Protocols/_Hook.html.name: _Hook
Protocols/_Hook.html.abstract: Base hook type. Non-generic to be stored in arrays. See Hook for generic version.

Protocols.html#/s:10SwiftHooks7_PluginP.name: _Plugin
Protocols.html#/s:10SwiftHooks7_PluginP.abstract: Base plugin type. Used for array storage.

Protocols/Plugin.html.name: Plugin
Protocols/Plugin.html.abstract: A Plugin contains Commands and Listeners, usually grouped by purpose and can be registered to the main SwiftHooks class.

Extensions/BinaryFloatingPoint.html#/s:S.name: resolveArgument(_:on:)
Extensions/BinaryFloatingPoint.html#/s:S.abstract: Attempts to resolve an argument from the provided string.

Extensions/FixedWidthInteger.html#/s:s17.name: resolveArgument(_:on:)
Extensions/FixedWidthInteger.html#/s:s17.abstract: Attempts to resolve an argument from the provided string.

Enums/GlobalEvent.html#/s:10SwiftHooks11.name: messageCreate
Enums/GlobalEvent.html#/s:10SwiftHooks11.abstract: Emitted when a new message comes in.

Enums/CommandError.html#/s:10SwiftHooks1.name: InvalidPermissions
Enums/CommandError.html#/s:10SwiftHooks1.abstract: User executing this command does not have the required permissions.

Enums/CommandError.html#/s:10SwiftHooks1.name: ConsumingArgumentIsNotLast(_:)
Enums/CommandError.html#/s:10SwiftHooks1.abstract: Development error. Consuming arguments should always appear last in the argument chain.

Enums/CommandError.html#/s:10SwiftHooks1.name: ArgumentNotFound(_:)
Enums/CommandError.html#/s:10SwiftHooks1.abstract: Invalid or too few arguments passed on command invocation.

Enums/CommandError.html#/s:10SwiftHooks1.name: localizedDescription
Enums/CommandError.html#/s:10SwiftHooks1.abstract: Retrieve the localized description for this error.

Enums/CommandError.html.name: CommandError
Enums/CommandError.html.abstract: Errors thrown from command invocations or pre-checking.

Classes/SwiftHooks.html#/s:10SwiftHooksA.name: run()
Classes/SwiftHooks.html#/s:10SwiftHooksA.abstract: Run the SwiftHooks process. Will boot all connected Hooks and block forever.

Classes/SwiftHooks.html#/s:10SwiftHooksA.name: hook(_:)
Classes/SwiftHooks.html#/s:10SwiftHooksA.abstract: Connect a new _Hook to the SwiftHooks system.

Classes/SwiftHooks.html#/s:10SwiftHooksA.name: dispatchEvent(_:with:from:on:)
Classes/SwiftHooks.html#/s:10SwiftHooksA.abstract: Dispatch an event from a _Hook into the central SwiftHooks system.

Classes/SwiftHooks.html#/s:10SwiftHooksA.name: register(_:)
Classes/SwiftHooks.html#/s:10SwiftHooksA.abstract: Register a plugin to the SwiftHooks system.

Classes/Arguments.html#/s:10SwiftHooks9A.name: get(_:named:on:)
Classes/Arguments.html#/s:10SwiftHooks9A.abstract: Resolve an argument from the command arguments

Classes/SwiftHooks.html.name: SwiftHooks
Classes/SwiftHooks.html.abstract: Main SwiftHooks class. Acts as global controller.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
